tool_description:
With this api it is possible to rewrite texts quickly generating several versions.
It is also possible to generate spintax for different texts.
name: Rephraser Text and Spintax
title: Rephraser Text and Spintax

api_list.name: text_to_spintax
api_list.description: text_to_spintax - in this parameter you pass the text that will be returned spintax.

optional_parameters.name: text_to_spintax
optional_parameters.default: A physical activity capable of working in a complementary way with issues related to stress, anxiety, in addition to collaborating in the treatment of depression and insomnia.

api_list.name: text_to_rewrite
api_list.description: text_to_rewrite - in this parameter you pass the text that will be returned rewritten.

optional_parameters.name: text_to_rewrite
optional_parameters.default: A physical activity capable of working in a complementary way with issues related to stress, anxiety, in addition to collaborating in the treatment of depression and insomnia.
